ai-patthana8.13:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.13:1.1_0: not for anyone who understands the teaching, or whose teaching does not come up.
ai-patthana8.13:1.1_1: One does not ask for the Dhamma for the sake of finding fault for a long time.
ai-patthana8.13:1.1_2: they don’t ask because of a thought that they’re better indeed, they don’t get caught, or because of their causes and conditions.
ai-patthana8.13:2.1_0: not by someone else who understands the teaching,
ai-patthana8.13:3.1_0: they don’t give rise to confidence in those who know or see. Three conditions are wrong. ...
ai-patthana8.13:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.13:5.1_0: The thighs on the inside, is finished.
